subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Television
Ratings (Audience Measurement)
lead_paragraph: The network crushed the competition for the 17 days of the international sporting colossus, averaging 21.4 million viewers, while live streaming of events skyrocketed.
snippet: The network crushed the competition for the 17 days of the international sporting colossus, averaging 21.4 million viewers, while live streaming of events skyrocketed.
